name: WP WebClap
author: Yuki Kisaragi

sections.description:
This plugin can add a “Web Clap” button to your blog.
In addition, I can change a text every entry.
sections.installation:
install from archive file.

  1. Upload ‘wp-webclap’ directory to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Change permission ‘wp-webclap/caches’ to 0777
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

install from Plugin Directory.

  1. search ‘WpWebclap’ for plugin install page.
  2. click to install “wp-webclap”
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq: A question that someone might have
sections.changelog:
0.1.7

  • append button of clap count data deletion. (built-in mode)
  • append data deletion at the time of uninstallation.
  • fixed build-in clap button. (page_id support)

0.1.6

  • support for display clap count for web clap button.

0.1.5

  • support for page ranking to analysis page.
  • fixed post bug.

0.1.4

  • fixed manual buttun display bug.

0.1.3

  • support for configuration change role of analysis page.
  • support for configuration button display position for additional clap page. (built-in engine)
  • support for configuration commented user name input area. (built-in engine)
  • fixed character set bug.

0.1.2

  • support for configuration open window type.

0.1.1

  • fixed auto button insert.

0.1.0

  • support for built in webclap engine.
  • fixed options.

0.0.6

  • bugifx: dead plugin at initialize option data.

0.0.5

  • support for upward wordpress 3.0
  • support for multilingualization
  • plugin directory registration.

0.0.2

  • append function to button value change.

0.0.1

  • first release.
